case_title: United States of America v. Calvin
case_info_full_case_name: United States of America v. Calvin

charges.charge_disposition: Sentenced to the Bureau of Prisons for a term of 12 months concurrent with Count 2 but consecutive to the state sentence; Supervised release for a term of 3 years concurrent with Count 2; Special assessment of $200.00; Restitution due in the amount of $3,459.49; Fine waived.

Sentenced to the Bureau of Prisons for a term of 12 months concurrent with Count 1 but consecutive to the state sentence; Supervised release for a term of 3 years concurrent with Count 1; Special assessment of $200.00; Restitution due in the amount of $3,459.49; Fine waived.
